relevant_findings: Saccadic visual pursuit with intact voluntary saccades
Strength preserved but tone diffusely diminished
Deep tendon reflexes absent in upper and lower extremities
Marked ataxia on finger-to-nose and heel-to-shin tests
Intention tremor and dysrhythmokinesia on hand tapping
Stable stance with no truncal ataxia
Positive Romberg with subtle sway on eye closure
Wide-based gait, unable to tandem walk
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Dysarthria improved over time; imbalance remained unchanged.

relevant_findings: Elevated protein 207 mg/dL in lumbar puncture
Elevated glucose 194 mg/dL in lumbar puncture with no pleocytosis
EMG revealed moderate, length-dependent motor and sensory, predominantly axonal, polyneuropathy

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: MRI showed symmetric signal abnormalities in the pons and cerebellum.

relevant_findings: Normalized gait and able to tandem walk
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in speech and coordination noted.
